name: Risky World
description:
It's time to conquer the world!

There are 4 ways to play:

1. Free play. Here you click on colors and click on countries and they become that color. (I use this with my students. When their group gets a question right, they get a country!)

2. Click on the country. The game names a country, and you have to click on it.

3. Multiple choice. A country is highlighted in red and you click on the right name.

4. Fill in the blank. The game highlights a country and you have to type in the name.

You can select which countries to play with based on size, location, language, etc.

Enjoy! Please feel free to leave comments below!
